title: performer
description: A json file representing a performer. The file is named by a MD5 Code.

url.description: URL to website of the performer

birthdate.description: Birthdate of the performer. Format is YYYY-MM-DD

death_date.description: Death date of the performer. Format is YYYY-MM-DD

ethnicity.description: Ethnicity of the Performer. Possible values are black, white, asian or hispanic

height.description: Height of the performer in centimeters

weight.description: Weight of the performer in kilograms

fake_tits.description: Whether performer has fake tits. Possible are Yes or No

career_length.description: The time the performer has been in business. In the format YYYY-YYYY

tattoos.description: Giving a description of Tattoos of the performer if any

piercings.description: Giving a description of Piercings of the performer if any

image.description: Image of the performer, parsed into base64

created_at.description: The time this performers data was added to the database. Format is YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD

updated_at.description: The time this performers data was last changed in the database. Format is YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD
